review: I have to tell you guys, these XLR cables that I have received recently are by far the best quality cables I have ever encountered in my entire music (professional) life.I would suggest these cables to any one of my colleagues.
This stand (it just arrived in the mail) will be durable in the years to come with my music I can tell. Awesome stand and I would recommend to anyone!

This mixer is perfect for the price that is specified. Although the blue LED power light is near blinding; the overall quality and functionality of this product is fantastic.I would suggest this anyone who is on a budget and would want a good quality mixer.
Very sturdy and awesome pop filter. Adjustable to any length you want and just a great pop filter! I would recommend this to anyone!
